title: Healthcare Revolution: AI Telemedicine
description: Implemented a comprehensive telemedicine platform that connected 500+ doctors with 100,000+ patients across rural India. The AI-powered symptom checker reduced unnecessary hospital visits by 40% and improved diagnostic accuracy.
results: 40% reduction in hospital visits, 100K+ patients served, 95% satisfaction rate

title: EdTech Transformation: Adaptive Learning
description: Developed an adaptive learning platform that personalized education for 50,000 students across 200 schools. The AI engine analyzed learning patterns and adjusted content difficulty in real-time.
results: 35% improvement in test scores, 50K students, 200 schools

title: FinTech Innovation: Smart Lending
description: Built an AI-driven loan processing system that reduced approval time from 7 days to 2 hours. The system analyzed 150+ data points to assess creditworthiness with 92% accuracy.

title: Retail Optimization: Inventory Intelligence
description: Deployed predictive inventory management across 150 stores, reducing stockouts by 60% and overstock by 45%. The system processed real-time sales data and weather patterns for accurate forecasting.

title: Agriculture Tech: Crop Intelligence
description: Implemented IoT sensors and AI analytics for 5,000 farmers across Punjab and Haryana. The platform provided real-time crop health monitoring and weather-based recommendations.

title: Smart City: Traffic Management
description: Developed an AI-powered traffic management system that reduced congestion by 35% in key corridors. The system used computer vision and predictive modeling to optimize signal timing.
results: 35% less congestion, 20% faster commutes, City-wide impact
